message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get 6000 and you get 4000.  It's better to settle now before inflation eats away at the value.
Your offer was unfair, Alice. Let's be more realistic this time. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  Consider that the value decreases for both of us as we delay.
Bob, time is running out and the value is going down. I'll accept your 55/45 split, but in MY favor this time. It's the best offer you'll get!
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly before inflation eats away at any more of your share.
